title: Scream
content: MERN Stack: MERN Stack is a Javascript Stack that is used for easier and faster deployment of full-stack web applications. MERN Stack comprises of 4 technologies namely: MongoDB, Express, React and Node. js. It is designed to make the development process smoother and easier.
